code: import axios from"axios";export var url="http://localhost:2000/posts";export var fetchPosts=function fetchPosts(){return axios.get(url);};var config={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};export var createPost=function createPost(newPost){return axios.post(url,newPost);};export var updatePost=function updatePost(id,updatedPost){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),updatedPost);};export var deletePost=function deletePost(id){return axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));};export var likePost=function likePost(id){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id,"/likePost"));};
